experiences.title: Software Engineer | Software Developer | System Analyst / Objective and Eduzz

cases.title: App Store - Store / Space
cases.description: Web-based storefront application with over 8,000 purchases, developed with React.js using Context API, Styled Components, Ant Design, and single tests on React Testing Library. Built relying on technical documentations to ensure a robust, efficient, and high performance app.

cases.title: Facilities - Store / Space
cases.description: Web-based application in micro front-end architecture, allowing for each component to be used independently outside of the app store that easily integrates with the client’s solutions.

cases.title: Backoffice - Store / Space
cases.description: Web-based application to allow the users complete management of the app store, including account creation, setting access permissions and other admin features.
